languages.text: {n}Из утробы механизма доносится приглушенное жужжание, и порция кислотной жидкости выплескивается в колбу. Провидец внутри с ужасом раскрывает глаза и начинает нервно дергаться, однако через несколько секунд снова затихает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Из утробы механизма доносится приглушенное жужжание, и порция кислотной жидкости выплескивается в колбу. Провидец внутри с ужасом раскрывает глаза и начинает нервно дергаться, однако через несколько секунд снова затихает.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A muted buzzing comes from the bowels of the mechanism, and a dose of acidic liquid splashes into the vat. The Farseer inside opens his eyes, terrified, and twitches nervously for a few seconds before going still again.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Из утробы механизма доносится приглушенное жужжание, и порция кислотной жидкости выплескивается в колбу. Провидец внутри с ужасом раскрывает глаза и начинает нервно дергаться, однако через несколько секунд снова затихает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A muted buzzing comes from the bowels of the mechanism, and a dose of acidic liquid splashes into the vial. The Farseer inside opens his eyes, terrified, and twitches nervously for a few seconds before going still again.{/n}

{n}A muted buzzing comes from the bowels of the mechanism, and a dose of acidic liquid splashes into the vat. The Farseer inside opens his eyes, terrified, and twitches nervously for a few seconds before going still again.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Se oye un zumbido apagado procedente de las entrañas del mecanismo, y una dosis del líquido ácido se vierte al interior de la cuba. El vidente del interior abre los ojos, aterrorizado, y se agita nerviosamente durante unos segundos antes de volver a quedarse quieto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A muted buzzing comes from the bowels of the mechanism, and a dose of acidic liquid splashes into the vat. The Farseer inside opens his eyes, terrified, and twitches nervously for a few seconds before going still again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se oye un zumbido apagado procedente de las entrañas del mecanismo, y una dosis del líquido ácido se vierte al interior de la cuba. El vidente del interior abre los ojos, aterrorizado, y se agita nerviosamente durante unos segundos antes de volver a quedarse quieto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}装置の奥から警報が鳴り響き、酸性の液体が漕の中へ飛び散った。中にいた先見司は恐怖のあまり目を見開き、少しの間痙攣したあと、再び動かなくなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A muted buzzing comes from the bowels of the mechanism, and a dose of acidic liquid splashes into the vat. The Farseer inside opens his eyes, terrified, and twitches nervously for a few seconds before going still again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}装置の奥から警報が鳴り響き、酸性の液体が漕の中へ飛び散った。中にいた先見司は恐怖のあまり目を見開き、少しの間痙攣したあと、再び動かなくなった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}机械内部发出微弱的嗡嗡声，酸性液体注入了容器中。里面的先知睁开眼睛，神情惊恐万分，紧张地抽搐了几秒钟，随后又静止不动了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A muted buzzing comes from the bowels of the mechanism, and a dose of acidic liquid splashes into the vat. The Farseer inside opens his eyes, terrified, and twitches nervously for a few seconds before going still again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}机械内部发出微弱的嗡嗡声，酸性液体注入了容器中。里面的先知睁开眼睛，神情惊恐万分，紧张地抽搐了几秒钟，随后又静止不动了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un bourdonnement feutré s'échappe des entrailles du mécanisme et une dose de liquide acide se déverse dans la cuve. Le Grand Prophète qui se trouve à l'intérieur ouvre les yeux, terrifié, et est pris de spasmes pendant quelques secondes avant de redevenir immobile.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A muted buzzing comes from the bowels of the mechanism, and a dose of acidic liquid splashes into the vat. The Farseer inside opens his eyes, terrified, and twitches nervously for a few seconds before going still again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un bourdonnement feutré s'échappe des entrailles du mécanisme et une dose de liquide acide se déverse dans la cuve. Le Grand Prophète qui se trouve à l'intérieur ouvre les yeux, terrifié, et est pris de spasmes pendant quelques secondes avant de redevenir immobile.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aus dem Inneren des Mechanismus ertönt ein gedämpftes Vibrieren und eine Säure wird in den Tank geleitet. Der Runenprophet im Inneren öffnet verängstigt seine Augen und zuckt mehrere Sekunden lang nervös vor sich hin, bevor er wieder still daliegt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A muted buzzing comes from the bowels of the mechanism, and a dose of acidic liquid splashes into the vat. The Farseer inside opens his eyes, terrified, and twitches nervously for a few seconds before going still again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus dem Inneren des Mechanismus ertönt ein gedämpftes Vibrieren und eine Säure wird in den Tank geleitet. Der Runenprophet im Inneren öffnet verängstigt seine Augen und zuckt mehrere Sekunden lang nervös vor sich hin, bevor er wieder still daliegt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mekanizmanın derinliklerinden sesi kesilen bir cızırtı geliyor ve tanka bir doz aşındırıcı likit akıtılıyor. İçeride yatan Ötesezen, dehşete düşmüş hâlde gözlerini açıyor, birkaç saniyeliğine gerginlikle titreyip tekrar hareketsiz kalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A muted buzzing comes from the bowels of the mechanism, and a dose of acidic liquid splashes into the vat. The Farseer inside opens his eyes, terrified, and twitches nervously for a few seconds before going still again.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mekanizmanın derinliklerinden sesi kesilen bir cızırtı geliyor ve tanka bir doz aşındırıcı likit akıtıyor. İçeride yatan Ötesezen, dehşete düşmüş bir hâlde gözlerini açıyor ve tekrar hareketsiz kalana dek birkaç saniyeliğine gerginlikle titriyor.{/n}
